title: U.S. stocks open lower as banks kick off earnings reporting for fourth quarter
total_text: U.S. stocks opened lower Friday as banks kicked off earnings reporting for the fourth quarter. The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.11% was down 0.7% soon after the opening bell, while the S&P 500 SPX, -0.20% fell 0.8% and the Nasdaq Composite COMP, -0.11% dropped 0.9%, according to FactSet data, at last check. Investors are weighing fourth-quarter results from Wall Street banks including JPMorgan Chase & Co. JPM, +1.15%, Bank of America Corp. BAC, +0.49%, Citigroup Inc. C, +0.61% and Wells Fargo & Co. WFC, -1.03%.
